channel.title: Weekly Monday Discussion # 3
channel.description:
# Welcome to the Weekly Monday Discussion studio, this is ur prob not favorite bird, me DatBird.
**Dat:** Yeah I run this show for some reason now. CLAP!
**Audience:** *pitifully claps*
**Dat:** Well last week as the special guest I asked,
"Would people be down for mafia games over discord, just fun party games like jackbox, both, or none."
And here are the results
>![image|690x370](upload://y1rFUli7p2NXY6n2LqqqOHDVavc.png) > Making a flowers face anonymous was kinda hard ngl
**Dat:** Well it seems like a good majority of you wanted it, so we started having some BOTC over discord over in the Kingdom *wink wink nudge nudge* **go join**. People seem to enjoy it, except having to out as Virgins. So good decision yall.
Well for this week I have something a little more personal to how I run the forums more specifically the queue of game that I would like the communities thoughts on. Its a two parter so get ready.
## First what do you think of the current way we are handling the queue. Imma link a google forms down below to get constructive criticism. #### Some small changes that are in the works by me include making the game type category more blatant with what each type is. I saw a few suggestions on what they should be in the queue discussion today or yesterday but Im gonna write out some more prob by the end of the night. Other than that the other change more relies on the communities thoughts on the next question
# [GOOGLE FORM](https://forms.gle/GAYRgzCkfEFK3GJD9)
## For the poll this time around, how many games should be run at one time. This is also a two parter, as Imma ask for Miscs as well. ## Forum Games [poll type=regular results=always public=true chartType=bar] * 1 * 2 * 3 [/poll]
## Miscs [poll name=poll2 type=regular results=always public=true chartType=bar] * 1 * 2 [/poll] #### We at the mod team have been hearing complaints that there are not enough and too many games available at once so we want to hear yalls thoughts.
**Dat:** This is a discussion feel free to give your thoughts through the google form the polls and the discussion down below. https://media1.tenor.com/images/548205171d017fb0d47bef7c283d9248/tenor.gif?itemid=7447666
Look at the time we seem to have run out of it for this great Monday so til next time, join the convo, and keep on being cool people.
*outro music plays*

item.title: Weekly Monday Discussion # 3
item.dc:creator: katze
item.description:
The Council of Squoosh™️ approves of this

Read full topic

item.title: Weekly Monday Discussion # 3
item.dc:creator: DatBird
item.description:
I agree, thats why I like the discussion and I think thats the plan. Ive been abit busy but I plan to get wrting out a fully fledged system soon.tm

Read full topic

item.title: Weekly Monday Discussion # 3
item.dc:creator: katze
item.description:
katze:

like, definitely not 3 full sized games at once

Marshal:

Large games = 3
Small games = 1
Medium games = 2

Max amount of games that can run at one time has the point value of 5. Anything above 5 is too many.

No more than 3 games run at once

this may not make sense to simple minded people like yourselves but I have singlehandedly solved the queue

i think an option more aligned with these would get majority vote though

i dont think most people voting 3 would support 3 FoL/SFoL sized games at once

but like

FoL/10p vanilla/9p vanilla has no reason to not run

a flat out “2” or “3” answer is probably not enough

Read full topic

item.title: Weekly Monday Discussion # 3

item.description:
Basically why I asked, its so like 50 50 on complaints. Hopefully we can get a system that works for all

Read full topic

It’s a completely good idea to run a points system, except it’s not because people will look at it and not bother to actually read it

But it doesn’t have numbers so it doesn’t make me seem as smart

item.title: Weekly Monday Discussion # 3
item.dc:creator: Marshal
item.description:
I do also just want to say that I’m super grateful to the moderation team for the recent changes to the forum and it’s operations.

Even if may disagree with a few things this effort to help make the community better and addressing issues that have been voiced is at least on my end very much appreciated

Read full topic

item.title: Weekly Monday Discussion # 3
item.dc:creator: KyoDaz
item.description:
So basically it’s just saying that

  • Only one large game can run at a time
  • Only two medium games can run at a time
  • Two medium games cannot run alongside a large game
  • Only three games may be run at a time

I think this is simpler

Read full topic

item.title: Weekly Monday Discussion # 3
item.dc:creator: Marshal
item.description:
No.

This also has 3 medium games at a time being no.

Because 3 FoL-sized games at one time is IMO too many people at once

Read full topic

item.title: Weekly Monday Discussion # 3
item.dc:creator: KyoDaz
item.description:
Oh, no. You can’t run three medium games.

Read full topic

item.title: Weekly Monday Discussion # 3
item.dc:creator: KyoDaz
item.description:
Marshal:

Large games = 3
Small games = 1
Medium games = 2

Max amount of games that can run at one time has the point value of 5. Anything above 5 is too many.

No more than 3 games run at once

this may not make sense to simple minded people like yourselves but I have singlehandedly solved the queue

… Isn’t it just the exact same thing by saying only one large game can run at a time, and only three games can run at a time?
And I agree

Read full topic
